scripts.prep:matic: mustache networks/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prep:mumbai: mustache networks/mumbai.json subgraph.template.mumbai.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prep: mustache networks/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn prep:mumbai; graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ digitalax/digitalaxmumbai
scripts.deploy:matic: yarn prep:mainnet; graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ digitalax/digitalaxmatic
